room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: My family did this as a group. Seven of us were a family group aged from 8 to 63. Some were skeptics before we began. However, we all worked to find clues and the Dig challenged us all. It was fun and entertaining. The staff was nice and helpful. This was a first for everyone. We did not escape.

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: We did the Dig and loved it! It was challenging and exciting. The room set-ups and decorations are top notch. The staff were very friendly and answered all of our questions after the game was finished. Can't wait to try another room!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: We did the Dig as a family outing. This was our second escape room. The staff was great in explaining everything and very friendly. We had such a blast trying to figure out how to piece the clues together! One of the most awesome experiences I've ever had. Definitely doing it again!

room_title: Escape room "The Dig" by Escape the Room Indianapolis in Indianapolis
review: Had a blast! Staff were very nice and helpful. Puzzles in the Dig weren't too hard but were hard enough to be fun. Worst part was finding a parking spot, so plan ahead.
